name: ralndv2

body.origin:
|- wral(s0, cpw(cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), universe))
-| wcel(cv(s0), universe)

cumulated.origin:
|- wral(s0, cpw(cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), universe))
-| wcel(cv(s0), universe)

comment: Second example for a theorem about a restricted universal quantification in which the restricting class depends on the bound variable: all subsets of a set are sets. (Contributed by AV, 24-Jun-2023.)
